Description: Glazed steatite scarab, elytra marked, striated legs notched in places, pierced longitudinally, base inscribed with hieroglyphs naming mayor of Byblos Intan.
Curator's comments: Martin, Egyptian Admin and Private-name Seals (1971) cat no.261 [pl.32.14].
Bibliographic references: Martin 1971 / Egyptian administrative and private-name seals, principally of the Middle Kingdom and Second Intermediate Period (261)
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 14 Oct- 12 Mar, Leiden, Rijksmuseum van Oudheden, Byblos
